markdown:
Shemhazians rise from the souls of torturers and those who reveled in mutilating the physical bodies of their victims. Standing 35 feet tall, a shemhazian is well equipped with a wide range of claws, pincers, and fangs to continue inflicting such torments on those they encounter. Shemhazians delight in tormenting mortals, of course, but more than most demons, they revel in sharing the pain with their own kind. Other demons fear and hate shemhazians for this reason, with only the most powerful willing to work with a shemhazian to achieve a shared goal. Even then, the shemhazian is always on the watch for an opportunity to bring pain and suffering to their allies along with any foe. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 35 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 [Shemhazian](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2900) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 81 1.1 **Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 60 feet, [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Languages** [Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 100 feet **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +28, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +30 **Str** +9 **Dex** +5 **Con** +7 **Int** +0 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +3 --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +32 **Ref** +26 **Will** +27 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) **HP** 350 **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 15, [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) 15 **Paralyzing Gaze** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727)) 30 feet. A non-[demon](/Traits.aspx?ID=573) creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a DC 35 Fortitude save. If it fails, it's [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) for 1 round, and if it critically fails, it is [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85) for 1 round.
**Succor Vulnerability** A shemhazian's mutilation is a part of them, and they can't bear to see it reversed. The first time each round that a creature heals from damage the shemhazian dealt on their last turn, the demon takes 3d6 mental damage.
**Tail Whip** **Trigger** A creature within reach of the shemhazian's tail leaves a square during a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=658) action it's using; **Effect** The shemhazian attempts to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382) the triggering creature. On a success, the creature also takes damage as if the shemhazian had hit with a tail Strike, and if the creature was flying, it falls 30 feet. --- **Speed** 35 feet, climb 20 feet, fly 35 feet **Melee** jaws +33 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 3d12+17 piercing plus enfeebling bite **Melee** claw +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 3d8+17 slashing **Melee** pincer +33 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 3d8+17 bludgeoning plus Improved Grab **Melee** tail +33 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 3d8+17 slashing **Divine Innate Spells** DC 37 - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will) - **4th** [Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40) (×3), [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) (at will) - **5th** [Scouting Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=1661) (×3), [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) - **8th** [Divine Decree](/Spells.aspx?ID=82) - **Constant (7th)** [Truesight](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Rituals** DC 37 - **1st** [Demonic Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=142) **Enfeebling Bite** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) If the shemhazian's jaws Strike damages a creature, the target is enfeebled 3 for 24 hours. The target can attempt a DC 37 Fortitude save to reduce this to enfeebled 1 (or be unaffected on a critical success). **Focused Gaze** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The shemhazian focuses their gaze on a non-[demon](/Traits.aspx?ID=573) creature they can see within 30 feet. If that creature isn't already [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) by the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze, it must attempt a save against the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze. If that creature is slowed, it must succeed at a DC 35 Fortitude save or be [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85) for 1 round. A shemhazian can't use this ability against the same creature more than once per round. **[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=73)** claw
name: Shemhazian

Standing 35 feet tall, a shemhazian is well equipped with a wide range of claws, pincers, and fangs to continue inflicting such torments on those they encounter. Shemhazians delight in tormenting mortals, of course, but more than most demons, they revel in sharing the pain with their own kind. Other demons fear and hate shemhazians for this reason, with only the most powerful willing to work with a shemhazian to achieve a shared goal. Even then, the shemhazian is always on the watch for an opportunity to bring pain and suffering to their allies along with any foe. A non-demon creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a DC 35 Fortitude save. If it fails, it's slowed 1 for 1 round, and if it critically fails, it is paralyzed for 1 round.
